scripts.watch:scss:all: npm-run-all -p watch:scss:style watch:scss:style-dist watch:scss:km-bottom-nav watch:scss:km-bottom-nav-style watch:scss:mck-tab-visibility watch:scss:mck-tab-visibility-style
scripts.dev: export PRODUCT=kommunicate && npm-run-all -p build:dev build-dev:scss-to-css setup-git-hooks
scripts.dev-agent: export PRODUCT=agenticFirst && npm-run-all -p build:dev build-dev:scss-to-css setup-git-hooks
scripts.build-test: export NODE_ENV=test && export PRODUCT=kommunicate && npm-run-all build-server gulp-build
scripts.build-release: export NODE_ENV=release && export PRODUCT=kommunicate && npm-run-all build-server gulp-build
scripts.build-prod: export NODE_ENV=prod && export PRODUCT=kommunicate && npm-run-all build-server gulp-build
scripts.build-prod-agenticfirst: export NODE_ENV=prod_agenticfirst && export PRODUCT=agenticFirst && npm-run-all build-server gulp-build
scripts.build-test-agenticfirst: export NODE_ENV=test_agenticfirst && export PRODUCT=agenticFirst && npm-run-all build-server gulp-build
scripts.build-prod-enterprise: export NODE_ENV=prod_enterprise && export PRODUCT=kommunicate && npm-run-all build-server gulp-build
scripts.build-prod-in: export NODE_ENV=prod_in && export PRODUCT=kommunicate && npm-run-all build-server gulp-build
scripts.build-prod-eu: export NODE_ENV=prod_eu && export PRODUCT=kommunicate && npm-run-all build-server gulp-build
scripts.build-prod-cn: export NODE_ENV=prod_cn && export PRODUCT=kommunicate && npm-run-all build-server gulp-build
scripts.build-staging: export NODE_ENV=staging && export PRODUCT=kommunicate && npm-run-all build-server gulp-build
scripts.build-beta: export NODE_ENV=prod_beta && export PRODUCT=kommunicate && npm-run-all build-server gulp-build
